text: Hanave kamŋgɨz, Jisasɨv mbɨndɨŋ ya han njɨhame kamar. Osa anchɨ mahoror mah hamb mbɨ uvitand pɨŋ momŋgɨrɨm amar. Osa anchɨ mahororɨnsɨndɨvam hamb mbɨ uvitand pɨŋ omŋgɨj amar. Handɨv nzɨ osa anchɨ imbɨr han ŋɨmbɨŋɨn are maindaim amar. Nzɨ osa anchɨ enta kɨvah sɨzɨnd han ŋɨmbɨŋɨn are aindaiyin amar.
